summary: This mod adds a shrine inside of white runs bannered mare ask the inn keeper for a room in the room you will find the shrine. and you will find lil wayne there as well he will start you on your quest.
descriptionHtml:
Endorse if you liked the mod

How to install
add the .bsa file to your skyrim/data directory or just download with the nexus mod manager
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This mod adds a shrine inside of white runs bannered mare ask the inn keeper for a room in the room you will find the shrine. when you talk to lil wayne you will get a quest.  
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
plans for this mod
I plan to make a full sized shrine about the same size as the azura shrine that has quests to help lil wayne destroy sojaboy. plan to get better voice actors. custom shields for lil wayne a guild of lil wayne and more quests and ways to torture lil wayne 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
were is the shrine?
bannerd mare 
=========================================================================================
This mod adds
new items
new paintings 
new shrine
new npc
new quest
new shield 
fully Voice acted by me
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

credits to Artisanix for the paintings and frames resource. 
credits to Mordecayy  for the male dreadlocks resource 
credits to trebtreb for the custom sigil shields resource
and me for the rest 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(warning) this mod contains strong language,
This mod is meant to be a joke sorry if you don\'t get it 
 
kullikakka 
Stranger
Group:Members
lil wayne is gay
Sent Today, 05:03 PM
and so are u
GOOD FUNNI JOKIE!^
author: GrimWeeder
